org.kepler.stratosphere.stub

Class KeplerCoGroupStub

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.AbstractFunction
      • eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.functions.CoGroupFunction
        • org.kepler.stratosphere.stub.KeplerCoGroupStub
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.Function, eu.stratosphere.api.common.functions.GenericCoGrouper<eu.stratosphere.types.Record,eu.stratosphere.types.Record,eu.stratosphere.types.Record>, ExecutionListener

    public class KeplerCoGroupStub
extends eu.stratosphere.api.java.record.functions.CoGroupFunction
implements ExecutionListener
    A PACT CoGroup stub that runs a Kepler workflow. The workflow is loaded in configure(), and executed each time coGroup() is called.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl
